member.name: T:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits
member.summary: This class handles loading of pd_limits.bin. This file contains the information of Forbidden, Limited, and Semi-Limted cards that are in use in the game.

member.name: M:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor For Card_Limits.

member.name: P:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.Forbidden
member.summary: List of card IDs that are Forbidden Cards.

member.name: P:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.Limited
member.summary: List of card IDs that are Limited Cards.

member.name: P:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.SemiLimited
member.summary: List of card IDs that are Semi-Limited Cards.

member.name: M:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.Load(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Int64)
member.summary: This handles reading of card IDs from pd_limits.bin.
member.param: A new instance of a BinaryReader which has pd_limits.bin as it's loaded file.

member.name: M:Yu_Gi_Oh.File_Handling.Bin_Files.Card_Limits.Save(System.IO.BinaryWriter)
member.summary: This handles writing of card IDs to pd_limits.bin.
member.param: A new instance of a BinaryWriter which has pd_limits.bin as it's loaded file.
